verbose_text: Futamatsu et al reported that HGF suppressed T-cell proliferation and IFN-gamma production and increased IL-4 and IL-10 secretion from CD4 + T cells in vitro, and also reduced the severity of experimental autoimmune myocarditis in vivo by inducing Th2 cytokines and suppressing apoptosis of cardiomyocytes.
